mapper.select: SELECT UT.USER_NICKNAME FROM USER_TBL UT JOIN FREE_BOARD_TBL FT ON UT.USER_NO = FT.USER_NO WHERE FT.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD_TBL VALUES(FB_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{boardHead}, DEFAULT, #{boardTitle}, #{boardSubject}, DEFAULT, #{boardImage}, DEFAULT, #{userNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD_TBL SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_SUBJECT = #{boardSubject}, BOARD_IMAGE = #{boardImage}, UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
